attributeGlobalProperties.name: class
attributeGlobalProperties.description: Specifies one or more classnames for an element (refers to a class in a style sheet)

attributeGlobalProperties.name: contenteditable
attributeGlobalProperties.description: Specifies whether the content of an element is editable or not

attributeGlobalProperties.name: draggable
attributeGlobalProperties.description: Specifies whether an element is draggable or not

attributeGlobalProperties.name: dropzone
attributeGlobalProperties.description: Specifies whether the dragged data is copied, moved, or linked, when dropped

attributeGlobalProperties.name: hidden
attributeGlobalProperties.description: Specifies that an element is not yet, or is no longer, relevant

attributeGlobalProperties.name: id
attributeGlobalProperties.description: Specifies a unique id for an element

attributeGlobalProperties.name: tabindex
attributeGlobalProperties.description: Specifies the tabbing order of an element

multiSelectDropdown.name: multiSelectDropdown
multiSelectDropdown.description: Form Control to select multiple values from pre-populated values.
multiSelectDropdown.label: Select LOB

errorMessages.required: This field is required: error from new_selectLob

textInput.name: textInput
textInput.description: Form Control to provide one line values.
textInput.label: Text Input

properties.name: accept
properties.description: Specifies a filter for what file types the user can pick from the file input dialog box (only for type="file")

properties.name: alt
properties.description: Specifies an alternate text for images (only for type="image")

properties.name: autocomplete
properties.description: Specifies whether an <input> element should have autocomplete enabled

properties.name: autofocus
properties.description: Specifies that an <input> element should automatically get focus when the page loads

properties.name: checked
properties.description: Specifies that an <input> element should be pre-selected when the page loads (for type="checkbox" or type="radio")

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Specifies that an <input> element should be disabled

properties.name: form
properties.description: Specifies the form the <input> element belongs to

properties.name: list
properties.description: Refers to a <datalist> element that contains pre-defined options for an <input> element

properties.name: max
properties.description: Specifies the maximum value for an <input> element

properties.name: maxlength
properties.description: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in an <input> element

properties.name: min
properties.description: Specifies a minimum value for an <input> element

properties.name: minlength
properties.description: Specifies the minimum number of characters required in an <input> element

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: Specifies that a user can enter more than one value in an <input> element

properties.name: name
properties.description: Specifies the name of an <input> element

properties.name: pattern
properties.description: Specifies a regular expression that an <input> element's value is checked against

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Specifies a short hint that describes the expected value of an <input> element

properties.name: readonly
properties.description: Specifies that an input field is read-only

properties.name: required
properties.description: Specifies that an input field must be filled out before submitting the form

properties.name: size
properties.description: Specifies the width, in characters, of an <input> element

properties.name: src
properties.description: Specifies the URL of the image to use as a submit button (only for type="image")

properties.name: step
properties.description: Specifies the interval between legal numbers in an input field

properties.name: type
properties.description: Specifies the type <input> element to display

properties.name: value
properties.description: Specifies the value of an <input> element

properties.name: width
properties.description: Specifies the width of an <input> element (only for type="image")

singleSelectDropdown.name: singleSelectDropdown
singleSelectDropdown.description: Form Control to select a single value from pre-populated values.
singleSelectDropdown.label: Submitter LOB

dateInput.name: dateInput
dateInput.description: Form Control to select a date.
dateInput.label: Submission Date

errorMessages.datePast: Submission Date cannot be a date in the past

multiLineTextInput.name: multiLineTextInput
multiLineTextInput.description: Form Control to provide values spanning multiple lines.
multiLineTextInput.label: Submission Date

errorMessages.datePast: Submission Date cannot be a date in the past

radioButtonGroup.name: radioButtonGroup
radioButtonGroup.description: Form Control to choose one of the provided options.
radioButtonGroup.label: Submission Date

errorMessages.datePast: Submission Date cannot be a date in the past

checkBoxGroup.name: checkBoxGroup
checkBoxGroup.description: Form Control to choose multiple values from a set of given checkboxes.
checkBoxGroup.label: Submission Date

errorMessages.datePast: Submission Date cannot be a date in the past

helpText.name: helpText
helpText.description: Help Text providing details about a particular Form Control.
helpText.label: Submission Date

errorMessages.datePast: Submission Date cannot be a date in the past
